Game.Name: Momotarou Densetsu Gaiden - Dai-1-shuu (Japan)
Game.plot: Momotarou Densetsu Gaiden 1: Dai 1 Shuu is a Role-Playing game, published by Hudson,which was released in Japan in 1992.Cheat: Music And Visual Test PasswordAt the password screen, enter the following Japanese characters (format is Row #, Column #):Cheat: Extra OptionsAfter beating all 3 scenarios, go to the game select screen and highlight the top-left box with Momotaro in it. Now, press I to enter the menu box and there should be two new options, one to see the Staff Roll and another to play the Music and Visuals.
